UpdatePolicy.name: DataSource
UpdatePolicy.description: Maintenance policy for DataSource (V4.0) data model

UpdatePolicyMethod.description: Remove main specification records from repository when they are linked to products which have been removed from the catalog
Remove extended specification records from repository when they are linked to products which have been removed from the catalog
Remove standardized description records from repository when they are linked to products which have been removed from the catalog
Remove parent/accessory links records from repository when their parent product have been removed from the catalog
Remove compatibility records from repository for accessory products which have been removed from the catalog
Remove compatibility update records from repository products which have been removed from the catalog
Remove parent/accessory links records from repository when they were flagged as needing an update (delete+insert)
Remove compatibility records from repository when they were flagged as needing an update
Remove searchable attribute records from repository when they are linked to products which have been removed from the catalog
Remove atomic searchable attribute records from repository when they are linked to products which have been removed from the catalog
Remove metamapping records from repository when they are linked to products which have been removed from the catalog
Remove searchable attribute records from repository when they are linked to products which have been removed from the catalog
Remove searchable attribute records from repository when they are linked to products which have been removed from the catalog
Remove product records from repository when they are linked to products which have been removed from the catalog
Remove product->digital content associations when the product is no longer part of the catalog
Remove product->digital content associations when the content has changed (part of the increment's DigitalContent_Prod.txt file)
Clean up the digital content product master when products are removed from the catalog
Delete dangling references from AccessoryCompatibility_Complement
Delete region links which have seen the content they were related to go away
Delete region links which have seen the content they were related to go away
Delete meta data which have seen the content they were related to go away
Delete text records which have seen the content they were related to go away
Update existing/changed SKUStatus records and insert new ones
Update existing/changed Catalog records and insert new ones
Replace old MediaType definitions with new one
Replace old region definitions with new one
Replace old Language definitions with new one
Update existing/changed DigitalContent records and insert new ones
Update existing/changed content/language associations records and insert new ones
Update existing/changed content/language associations records and insert new ones
Update existing/changed DigitalContent records and insert new ones
Add products which have digital content from increment
Add product->digital content links from increment
Delete existing extended spec records for products which have been updated. Insert new/updated extended spec records
Delete existing extended spec records for products which have been updated. Insert new/updated extended spec records
Update existing/changed DigitalContent text records and insert new ones
Update existing/changed vocabulary records and insert new ones
Update existing/changed atomic vocabulary records and insert new ones
Update existing/changed category listing and insert newly created categories
Entirely replace category->attribute allocations
Update existing/changed marketing information and insert new ones
Update existing/changed product information master record and insert new ones
Update existing/changed standardized descriptions and insert new ones
Update existing/changed extended spec vocabulary records and insert new ones
Update existing/changed mainspec vocabulary records and insert new ones
Delete existing extended spec records for products which have been updated. Insert new/updated extended spec records
Delete existing main spec records for products which have been updated. Insert new/updated extended spec records
Update existing/changed accessory compatilibility complements and insert new ones
Update existing/changed main spec vocabulary records and insert new ones
Delete accessory->parent records when updates are available then add updated/new records
Insert updated accessory->parent product links records
Delete searchable attribute records which may have changed then add their updates or new records
Delete atomic searchable attribute records which may have changed then add their updates or new records
Update existing/changed metamap contributors and insert new ones

Full reload of regions table
Full reload of lifecycle table
Full reload of languages table
Full reload of Version table
Full reload of Categories table
Full reload of Products table

Full reload of UNSPSC commodity definition table
Full reload of Product->UNSPSC allocation table
Refresh UNSPSC version (1 record)
Reload UNSPSC versions
Reload UNSPSC commodity codes/names
Refresh UNSPSC->CNET associations
Remove stale metamapping contributor information
Remove stale category definitions
Remove stale products from catalog (products not found in increment's catalog)
Remove SKU statuses which may have been discontinued
Remove unused regions
Remove unused media types
